item.title: 阿达尼绿色公司利润飙升，工厂安装速度加快
item.description: 阿达尼绿色能源有限公司（Adani Green Energy Ltd. ）的第一季度利润比去年同期攀升了 60%，主要原因是发电量大幅增加和售电量激增。【原文：Adani Green Energy Ltd.’s first-quarter profit climbed 60% from a year earlier, driven by a sharp rise in generation capacity and a surge in electricity sales.】

item.title: 据说帝亚吉欧将邀请美国银行和高盛集团对东非业务进行审查
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，帝亚吉欧集团已选择美国银行和高盛集团对东非啤酒有限公司进行战略审查，因为该酒商希望采用轻资产模式来释放资金，以恢复增长。【原文：Diageo Plc has picked Bank of America Corp. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. for a strategic review of East African Breweries Ltd., people familiar with the matter said, as the distiller looks to an asset light model to free up capital for reviving growth.】

item.title: 卡齐米尔认为欧洲央行在没有冲击的情况下将在 9 月维持利率不变
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员彼得-卡齐米尔（Peter Kazimir）认为，除非有证据表明经济出现严重恶化，否则央行不应在 9 月份降息。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t cut interest rates in September unless there’s evidence of a major deterioration in the economy, according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir.】

item.title: 做空者在风险最高的美股上损失 25 亿美元
item.description: 对于做空风险最高美股的交易员来说，本月是残酷的一个月，随着动物精神给散户投资者带来无限信心，策略师们预计熊市的苦难还将继续。【原文：It’s been a brutal month for traders shorting the riskiest US stocks, and as animal spirits imbue retail investors with boundless confidence, strategists expect the misery to continue for bears.】

item.title: 欧盟对俄罗斯实施限制后，印度炼油商更广泛地寻找石油
item.description: 印度是俄罗斯原油的最大进口国，在乌克兰战争期间欧盟对克里姆林宫实施新制裁后，印度的炼油商可能会考虑从莫斯科分散购买一些原油。【原文：Oil refiners in India, the biggest importer of Russian crude, may be looking at diversifying some buying away from Moscow after fresh European Union sanctions on the Kremlin amid the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国推出育儿补贴以提高出生率
item.description: 中国宣布将开始在全国范围内发放育儿补贴，这是继近年来令人担忧的出生率下降之后，中国为提高出生率而采取的最新举措。【原文：China announced that it will start handing out childcare subsidies across the nation, in its latest push to boost birthrates after a worrying drop in recent years.】

item.title: 拳击、后空翻机器人统治中国最大的人工智能峰会
item.description: 从笨重的六英尺机器到灵活的翻跟头狗，机器人在本周于上海举行的中国最重要的年度人工智能大会上大显身手。数以千计的人来到现场，目不转睛地观看各种机器人在工作时的滑稽动作：分发爆米花和饮料（乱七八糟的）、剥鸡蛋、在拳击场上比武、打麻将，或者只是在巨大的展厅里闲逛。【原文：From lumbering six-foot machines to nimble back-flipping dogs, robots lorded over China’s most important annual AI conference in Shanghai this week. Thousands turned up to gawk at the antics of a bewildering array of droids at work: dispensing popcorn and drinks (messily), peeling eggs, sparring in a boxing ring, playing mahjong or just wandering around the cavernous exhibition hall.】

item.title: KNDS 与 Triton 在伦克股权纠纷后达成协议
item.description: 投资公司 Triton Partners 已同意将其在变速箱制造商伦克集团（Renk Group AG）的约一半股份转让给法德防务公司 KNDS NV，从而解决了自今年 2 月以来一直拖延的争端。【原文：Investment firm Triton Partners has agreed to transfer about half of its shares in gearbox maker Renk Group AG to Franco-German defense company KNDS NV, settling a dispute that has dragged on since February.】

item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度人寿保险公司正在与华尔街最大的几家银行合作，对冲其负债。【原文：Life Insurance Corp. of India is working with some of Wall Street’s largest banks to hedge its liabilities, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚推出对冲波动的定向电力期货
item.description: 澳大利亚世界领先的屋顶太阳能热潮促使该国最大的证券交易所从其峰值电力对冲合约中削减了一天中的中间时段。【原文：Australia’s world-leading rooftop solar boom has helped lead the nation’s top bourse to cut the middle of the day from its peak power hedging contract.】

item.title: 奇货可居：中国企业如何应对美国关税 (播客)
item.description: 特朗普总统已宣布对几乎所有贸易伙伴征收关税。然而，有一种真实的感觉是，其最终目的是要阻止人们所认为的来自中国的经济威胁。关于如何在某种意义上 "打赢 "贸易战，一种设想是将中国与世界其他国家隔离开来。但这是不可能的。事实上，中国正在加深与其他贸易国的关系，尤其是在亚洲。在本期节目中，我们将与卡梅伦-约翰逊（Cameron Johnson）进行对话。【原文：President Trump has announced tariffs on basically every trading partner. However there is a real sense that the ultimate goal is to hamper the perceived economic threat from China. One vision for how the trade war could be “won” in some sense is by isolating China from the rest of the world. But that’s not happening. And in fact, if anything, China is deepening its relationship with other trading nations right now, particularly in Asia. On this episode we speak with Cameron Johnson, a partner a】

item.title: Cinven 确认与数据服务公司 Artefact 进行独家谈判
item.description: 私募股权公司 Cinven 正在就收购数据和人工智能咨询服务提供商 Artefact 进行独家谈判。【原文：Private equity firm Cinven is in exclusive negotiations to acquire Artefact, a provider of data and artificial intelligence consulting services.】

item.title: 高咖啡价格提高了非洲最大出口商的收益
item.description: 在过去的 12 个月里，乌干达的咖啡收入翻了一番还多，原因是全国性的增产运动赶上了价格上涨的浪潮。【原文：Uganda’s coffee earnings have more than doubled in the past 12 months as a national drive for more production caught a rising price wave.】

item.title: 北欧银行领衔欧洲 IPO 安排机构，本地上市蓬勃发展
item.description: 一家地区性投资银行已成为欧洲最多产的首次公开募股承销商，在欧洲大陆最北端挖掘出丰富的上市资源。【原文：A regional investment bank has become Europe’s most prolific underwriter of initial public offerings, tapping a rich vein of listings in the continent’s northernmost corner.】

item.title: 私人贷款机构 Flow Capital Partners 启动 1.25 亿美元基金
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，总部位于香港的信贷管理公司福禄资本合伙公司（Flow Capital Partners）推出了一只新基金，该基金将更广泛地关注亚洲市场，这将为在该地区扩张的私人借贷机构增添新的一员。【原文：Hong Kong-based credit manager Flow Capital Partners has launched a new fund with a broader Asia focus, people familiar with the matter said, adding to a list of private lenders expanding in the region.】

item.title: 对冲基金和财富管理公司推动迪拜金融中心实现创纪录增长
item.description: 尽管存在地缘政治紧张局势和关税不确定性，但随着对冲基金和财富管理公司的不断涌入，迪拜金融中心今年上半年的公司注册量创下了历史新高。【原文：Dubai’s financial hub reported a record increase in company registrations in the first half of the year, as the influx of hedge funds and wealth management firms continued despite geopolitical tensions and tariff uncertainty.】

item.title: 利润下滑，Valterra Platinum 将上半年股息削减 79
item.description: Valterra Platinum Ltd.称，上半年利润下降了91%，原因是一个关键矿山被洪水淹没，导致减产，而且该公司最近从英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）剥离过程中产生了成本。【原文：Valterra Platinum Ltd. said first-half profit fell 91%, after flooding at a key mine cut production and the company incurred costs during its recent spinoff from Anglo American Plc.】

item.title: 中国开放式人工智能挑战者智璞将发布新的开源模型
item.description: 智璞公司发布了迄今为止最大的开源模型，加入了越来越多的中国公司加强免费人工智能产品的行列。【原文：Zhipu is releasing its biggest open-source model to date, joining a growing number of Chinese firms ramping up their free artificial intelligence offerings.】

item.description: 马来西亚央行下调了 2025 年的经济增长预期，以应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税的影响。【原文：Malaysia’s central bank lowered its growth projection for 2025 as it contends with the fallout from US President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 中国锂市场可能受到供应中断的影响
item.description: 在投资者竞相抬高价格以防范可能出现的供应中断之后，中国的锂市场（一种关键的电池金属）出现了剧烈波动。【原文：Chinese markets for lithium, a key battery metal, are seeing heightened volatility after investors bid up prices to guard against possible supply disruptions.】

item.title: Iberdrola 与埃施朗成立合资公司在西班牙开发数据中心
item.description: 西班牙电力巨头伊比德罗拉公司（Iberdrola SA）正在与埃施朗数据中心公司（Echelon Data Centres）组建一家合资企业，在西班牙建设和运营数据中心，从而在其本土市场的这一资本密集型和高耗能行业中占据一席之地。【原文：Spanish power giant Iberdrola SA is forming a joint venture with Echelon Data Centres to build and operate data centers in Spain, gaining a foothold in the capital-intensive and energy-hungry sector in its home market.】

item.title: 铜价上涨，开启美国关税截止日期前的关键一周
item.description: 本周包括美联储会议、一系列关键经济数据以及美国即将对工业金属征收关税的最终细节。【原文：Copper rose to kick off a critical week that includes a Federal Reserve meeting, a swathe of key economic data and the prospect of final details on imminent US tariffs on the industrial metal.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉执政党大获全胜，巩固一党统治
item.description: 尼古拉斯-马杜罗总统说，他的执政党社会主义党在周日的地方选举中赢得了大多数市长职位，巩固了其对权力的控制，并将委内瑞拉进一步推向一党统治。【原文：President Nicolás Maduro said his ruling socialist party won a majority of mayorships in Sunday’s local elections, solidifying its hold on power and pushing Venezuela further into one-party rule.】
